summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North and West Seventy-seventh Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest, et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks to as amended by Ordinance No. 28276 under Ordinance No. 26261, creating Local Improvement District No. 2450 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
